amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 115-96 to ensure that the traditional Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) exemptions apply to the subsection pertaining to the Rule of Construction.
amendment.purpose: Amendment ensures that the traditional Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) exemptions apply to the subsection pertaining to the Rule of Construction.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 410 - 5 (Roll no. 232).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 410 - 5 (Roll no. 232).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
